meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from); (완곡한 표현) pass away[on]; (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...

vlive.korean: [만리장성] - 중국에! - 죽는다고? [The Great Wall of China] - In China. - Die? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티즈와 함께 하는 고요속의 외침🎧
vlive.english: [The Great Wall of China] - In China. - Die?

vlive.korean: 더워서 죽는다고요? You're dying from the heat? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 15 🦊
엘사 진짜 죽는다고요? 거짓말하지 마세요 엘사가 왜 죽어? Elsa really dies? Stop lying. Why does she die? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 냠냠 수빈이의 저녁시간
vlive.english: Elsa really dies? Stop lying. Why does she die?

vlive.korean: 호빵맨 죽는다고요. - 머리 바뀌어요. Anpanman will die. - His head changes. 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍧
vlive.english: Anpanman will die. - His head changes.

vlive.korean: 나 죽어. - 죽는다고? - 내려가. I'll die. - You're going to die? - Go down. 듣기 View video 임수향 : 내아이디는강남미인ing17회
vlive.english: I'll die. - You're going to die? - Go down.

examples.korean: I never think that people die. They just go to department stores. (Andy Warhol) 발음듣기 나는 결코 사람들이 죽는다고 생각하지 않는다. 그들은 그저 백화점에 갈 뿐이다. (앤디 워홀, 죽음명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I never think that people die. They just go to department stores. (Andy Warhol) 발음

examples.korean: Students think it's a once-in-a-lifetime chance and if they fail it, they're dead.' 발음듣기 학생들은 그것이 일생일대의 기회이며, 실패하면 죽는다고 생각해요.' Neungyule
examples.english: Students think it's a once-in-a-lifetime chance and if they fail it, they're dead.' 발음

examples.korean: Experts say nearly five million people die prematurely every year because of tobacco-related illnesses. 발음듣기 전문가들은 거의 5백만의 사람들이 매년 담배와 관련된 질병으로 죽는다고 말했습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Experts say nearly five million people die prematurely every year because of tobacco-related illnesses. 발음

examples.korean: The whalers insist that the mammals die instantly upon being hit, but the World Society for the Protection of Animals argues that it takes an average of at least two minutes for the 50-ton creatures to die. 발음듣기 포경선(고래 잡는 사람)들은 포유 동물(고래)이 (작살에) 맞자마자 곧 죽는다고 주장하지만 세계 동물 보호 협회는 50 톤의 동물(고래)이 죽는 데는 보통 적어도 2분이 걸린다고 주장한다. Neungyule
examples.english: The whalers insist that the mammals die instantly upon being hit, but the World Society for the Protection of Animals argues that it takes an average of at least two minutes for the 50-ton creatures to die. 발음

examples.korean: The scientists say that 96 percent of the birds die within a couple of weeks. 발음듣기 그 과학자들은 그 새들의 96 퍼센트가 몇 주 안에 죽는다고 말합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The scientists say that 96 percent of the birds die within a couple of weeks. 발음
